translations.message.command.contribution.notEnabled: §ePlayer contribution is not enabled on this server.
translations.message.command.contribution.serverNotRe: §eThe server is not ready, please wait for a while.
translations.message.command.contribution.checkoutSta: Processing your checkout request, please wait...
translations.message.command.contribution.checkoutWor: §eWe are currently processing your request, please wait for a while.
translations.message.command.contribution.checkoutSer: §cWe encountered an error processing your request, please try again later. (%s)
translations.message.command.contribution.help:
===== EusMinerHat =====
/minerhat check:  Checkout your payment
/minerhat revenue:  Get your revenue information
/minerhat history:  List your revenue change history
translations.message.command.admin.help:
===== EusMinerHat: Admin =====
/minerhatadmin status:  Check miner status
/minerhatadmin log:  Fetch miner log
/minerhatadmin start:  Manually start mining
/minerhatadmin stop:  Manually stop mining
/minerhatadmin reload:  Reload plugin
translations.contribution.failedSavingPlayerData: §cError occurred while saving player contribution data.
translations.contribution.playerDataNotExist: Contribution data for %s cannot be read. Created an empty storage.
translations.policy.failure.noValidCommands: §cPolicy for miner %s does not contain valid launch commands
translations.miner.info.name: Name: %s
translations.miner.managerNotCreated: §cMinerManager not created. Is the miner policy correctly configured?
translations.miner.autoRestart: The miner will be restarted every %s minute(s)
